item.title: God's Law or Mans Law
item.description: A celebrity priest fired up Twitter today by endorsing same-sex “marriage” and by comparing a same-sex couple favorably to the Holy Family. Let’s assume that the good father is not malicious but so poorly educated into reason and Church teaching that his embarrassing tweets make sense to him. Let’s pretend Fr. Sichko thinks he’s right. To help educate the ignorant priest (and educating the ignorant is one of our Christian duties), I’ll pose some questions to Fr.
